name: Mercury Blue: Mini Episode
description: Join Captain Jake Hunter and his loyal sidekick FU-2 as they storm across the galaxy in search of adventure (and revenge) in a side-splitting classic comedy adventure!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Later Processor: 2.0+ GHz processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: SM3-compatible video card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Later Processor: quad-core Intel or AMD processor Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: DX11 compatible video card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 9 GB available space
